entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few rain showers beginning this evening then changing to flurries at times heavy near midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
